mapper.sql: id, list_type, list_name, org_id, app_count, remark, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time
mapper.insert: insert into name_list (list_type, list_name, org_id, app_count, remark, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time) values (#{listType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{listName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into name_list
list_type,
list_name,
org_id,
app_count,
remark,
create_date,
create_user,
update_date,
update_user,
delete_time,

mapper.update:
update name_list
list_type = #{listType,jdbcType=CHAR},
list_name = #{listName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
app_count = #{appCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update name_list set list_type = #{listType,jdbcType=CHAR}, list_name = #{listName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_count = #{appCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(T1.id) FROM name_list T1 WHERE T1.org_id = #{params.orgId} AND T1.delete_time is null
AND T1.list_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.name} ,'%')
AND T1.list_type = #{params.type}
ORDER BY T1.update_date DESC
mapper.update: update app_list T1 set T1.delete_time = now() where T1.id in (select T2.app_id from application_name_list T2 where T2.name_list_id = #{id})
update application_name_list T1 set T1.delete_time = now() where T1.name_list_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.app_id as appId, t1.app_name as appName, t1.app_type as appType, t1.remark from app_list t1 inner join application_name_list t2 on t1.id = t2.app_id where t1.delete_time is null and t2.delete_time is null and t2.name_list_id = #{id}
